dcterms:description: A versatile benchmark for comprehensive forgery analysis, consisting of 221,247 videos, including 99,630 pristine and 121,617 manipulated videos, with a frame rate between 20 and 30 fps and variable duration. It includes videos with multiple identities and varying face-frame area ratios.
dcterms:title: ForgeryNet

dcterms:creator: Brian Dolhansky
Joanna Bitton
Ben Pflaum
Jikuo Lu
Russ Howes
Menglin Wang
Cristian Canton Ferrer
dcterms:description: The Deepfake Detection Challenge (DFDC) dataset, designed to facilitate the development of deepfake detection algorithms.
dcterms:title: DFDC (Deepfake Detection Challenge)

dcterms:creator: Brian Dolhansky
Russ Howes
Ben Pflaum
Nicole Baram
Cristian Canton-Ferrer
dcterms:description: The preview dataset for the Deepfake Detection Challenge (DFDC), providing a subset of the full dataset for initial testing and development.
dcterms:title: DFDC Preview

dcterms:creator: A. Rossler

dcterms:description: FaceForensics++ is a dataset designed for learning to detect manipulated facial images, providing a comprehensive set of videos and images for training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: FaceForensics++

dcterms:creator: Trung-Nghia Le
Huy Hoang Nguyen
Junichi Yamagishi
Isao Echizen
dcterms:description: OpenForensics is a large-scale dataset for multi-face forgery detection and segmentation in-the-wild, providing challenging scenarios for deepfake detection.
dcterms:title: OpenForensics
